topic_name: Neural cartography: Mapping the brain using a very strong magnet
image_credits: Compass Study. Calsidyrose [CC BY 2.0]
og_name: Neural cartography: Mapping the brain using a very strong magnet
og_description: Understanding the most complex organ in the human body is no easy task. But certain techniques are uncovering more and more about the structure and makeup of the human brain – by mapping it. Gaelle Coullon tells us more.
